name: Social, The
text:
THE SOCIAL

APPETIZERS SOUP OF THE DAY $6.49

FRIES regular or cajun $6.49

LOADED FRIES cheese, bacon and peppers, caramelized onions with chipotle mayo $10.99

SWEET POTATO FRIES served with chipotle mayo $9.49

POUTINE loaded with cheese, signature gravy and cheese curds small $8.99 large $10.99 add chicken, buffalo chicken or beef $5.99 add bacon $2.49

THE SOCIAL POUTINE loaded with cheese, signature gravy, cheese curds and brisket small $14.99 large $18.99 add chicken, buffalo chicken or beef $5.99

ONION RINGS served with chipotle mayo $8.99

DEEP FRIED PICKLES (8) served with ranch $13.99

HOMEMADE MOZZA STICKS (4) served with marinara sauce $14.49

JALAPEÃ‘OS POPPERS (8) served with ranch $11.49

CAULIFLOWER BITES tossed in your choice of sauce $15.49

CAESAR SALAD small $7.99 large $11.49 add chicken $5.99

WINGS 1 lb $14.99 2 lbs $25.99 SAUCE honey garlic, buffalo, hot, bbq, sweet chilli, teriyaki, hot honey maple DRY salt and pepper, garlic parm, roasted red pepper, dill pickle, cajun, salt and vinegar

NACHOS all loaded with cheese and served with salsa and sour cream extra veggie toppings $2.25 each CLASSIC tomatoes, olives, bacon, peppers half $13.99 full $17.99 LOADED peppers, onions, jalapenos, brisket, olives, tomatoes half $17.99 full $22.99 BUFFALO CHICKEN peppers, onions, tomatoes half $18.49 full $23.49

FLATBREAD BUFFALO CHICKEN buffalo chicken, cheese, caramelized onion, jalapenos, kapow sauce $19.49 MAPLE BACON JAM marinara, bacon jam, cheese, and caramelized onion $18.49 VEGGIE marinara, spinach, peppers, mushrooms, cheese $16.49

THE SOCIAL SHARING PLATTER #1 6 wings, 4 jalapeno poppers, 4 mozza sticks, onion rings, garlic bread $34.99 #2 8 wings, 6 jalapeno poppers, 6 mozza sticks, 6 deep fried pickles, onion rings and garlic bread $44.99

*beef and buns locally supplied by Maltese Grocery and Bennetts Bakery

img5.jpg (Daily Lunch Deals)
THE SOCIAL DAILY LUNCH DEALS 12 - 3 PM *DINE IN ONLY

SOUTHERN BRISKET GRILLED CHEESE 20 hour braised brisket, BBQ sauce, spicy mayo, and cheddar cheese, served with fries $14.99

BRUNCH BURGER homemade patty, cheddar cheese, bacon, tomato, over easy egg, chipotle mayo, served with fries $15.99

SOCIAL CHEESE STEAK 20 hour braised brisket, caramelized onion, bell peppers, monterey jack cheese served with fries $14.99

BBQ BRISKET CAESAR WRAP 20 hour braised brisket, caesar salad, bacon, bold bbq sauce and cheddar cheese served with fries $14.99

SWEET AND SPICY CHICKEN WRAP crispy chicken, bacon, shredded carrot, lettuce, chipotle sweet chilli mayo $14.99

LITE BITE bowl of daily soup and a small caesar salad $10.99

*beef and buns locally supplied by Maltese Grocery and Bennetts Bakery

img4.jpg (Chalkboard Specials)
Sunday Caesars $6.25 Chicken Quesadilla $14.99

Monday Margarita $8.75 Tacos (3) $14.99

Tuesday Palomas $8.75 Loaded Nachos $21.49

Wednesday House wine $6.00 Flatbread $15.49

Thursday Jug of Draft $24.00 2 lbs wings $23.99

Saturday Mimosas $11.50 Chicken Waffle $14.99

img7.jpg (Main Menu - Chicken, Burgers, Sandwiches, Sides, Treats)
CHICKEN BUTTERMILK CHICKEN FINGERS 5 chicken fingers served with your choice of plum or buffalo sauce for dipping $14.75 BUTTERMILK CHICKEN BURGER 6oz chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, mayo and cheddar cheese on a kaiser bun $14.75 DIRTY BIRD 6oz breaded buffalo chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, cheddar cheese and ranch sauce on a kaiser bun $14.99 CLASSIC CHICKEN WRAP breaded chicken breast, bacon, lettuce, tomato, chipotle mayo and cheddar cheese $13.49 MAPLE BBQ CHICKEN WRAP grilled chicken, cheddar, apple slaw, maple bbq sauce $13.99 add a classic side $4.75 add an upgraded side $7.49

BURGERS burgers are 4 oz patties made fresh, never frozen, and served on a kaiser bun CLASSIC CANADIAN cheddar cheese, bacon, lettuce, tomato, pickles and mayo $12.99 MAPLE BACON JAMMER beef patty, bacon jam, cheddar, dijon-maple aioli $16.25 JUICY LUCY cheese stuffed patty, caramelized onion, pickles, cheddar cheese and garlic aioli $14.99 BACON ALMIGHTY candied bacon, swiss cheese and garlic aioli $15.99 THE SOCIAL bacon, monterey jack cheese, special spicy seasoning, hot sauce, dijon mustard and topped off with crispy tater chips $15.99 extra patty $4.99 double cheese $1.99 double bacon $2.99 extra sauce $0.99 gravy $1.99 extra sour cream/salsa $1.99 gluten free bun $1.99 add a classic side $4.75 add an upgraded side $7.45 substitute any of these for a veggie burger $1.99 gluten free options burgers, buns, chicken, wings, gravy, nachos, salad

QUESADILLA all quesadillas served with chipotle mayo sauce, sour cream and salsa on the side CHICKEN cheese, bell peppers and regular or cajun chicken $16.99 THE SOCIAL cheese, caramelized onion and brisket $18.99 MUSHROOM cheese, garlic mushroom and caramelized onion $15.99

SANDWICHES served with your choice of Texas toast, or whole wheat bread GRILLED CHEESE $7.99 add bacon $2.99 BLT classic bacon, lettuce, tomato and mayo $10.99 CLUBHOUSE turkey, ham, bacon, lettuce, cheese, tomato, mayo $14.49 DENVER bacon, bell peppers, cheese $12.99 PATTY MELT 4oz patty, sauteed onions, cheese and chipotle mayo $12.99 HOT HAMBURGER SANDWICH grilled patty on toast, smothered with gravy $12.99 add a classic side for $4.75 add an upgraded side for $7.49 add cheese, garlic mushrooms or sauteed onions $1.99

SIDES CLASSIC SIDES $4.75 fries, caesar salad, soup, apple slaw UPGRADED SIDES $7.49 onion rings, poutine, sweet potato fries, bacon jam fries

TREATS cheesecake $7.99 chocolate, caramel or strawberry drizzle
